headline: Bloom Energy (BE) Valuation Check After US$2.65b AEP Fuel Cell Deal And Growth Partnerships
summary: Bloom Energy (BE) has been in focus after American Electric Power committed to a US$2.65b purchase of its solid oxide fuel cells, exercising an additional 900 MW option tied to a 2024 agreement. See our latest analysis for Bloom Energy. The AEP contract and other recent agreements have coincided with sharp gains, including a 68.32% 1 month share price return and a very large 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum has picked up as investors reassess Bloom Energy's...

headline: American Electric Power (AEP) Downgraded to ‘Neutral’, Price Target Trimmed
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is included among the 10 Best Performing Utility Stocks in 2025. American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is one of the largest electric utilities in the United States, powering millions of homes and businesses each day. On January 12, BofA analyst Ross Fowler downgraded American Electric Power Company, Inc. […]
